Package com.cafean.utils

Interface Conversions

  • public interface Conversions
    The conversions interface defines a set of methods which provide support for converting values between SI and British units.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      double convertValue​(int index, double val, boolean valueIsSI)
      Convert a value from SI to British or British to SI.
      double getConvFactor​(int index, boolean siToBritish)
      Retrieves the conversion factor for translating values of a specific unit from SI to British or British to SI.
      java.lang.String getTitle​(int index)
      Retrieves the label of the given unit.
      int getUnitIndex​(java.lang.String name)
      Determines the index for the given channel name.
      java.lang.String getUnitsBritish​(int index)
      Retrieves the British unit label of the given unit.
      java.lang.String getUnitsSI​(int index)
      Retrieves the SI unit label of the given unit.
      boolean isDefaultSI​(int index)
      Determines whether a unit index refers to a unit type for which values are considered SI by default.

    • Method Detail

      • getUnitIndex

        int getUnitIndex​(java.lang.String name)
        Determines the index for the given channel name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the channel
        Returns:
        an int describing the unit index of the provided channel

      • isDefaultSI

        boolean isDefaultSI​(int index)
        Determines whether a unit index refers to a unit type for which values are considered SI by default. If true, values of the indicated unit type default to SI. If false, values of the indicated unit type default to British.

      • getTitle

        java.lang.String getTitle​(int index)
        Retrieves the label of the given unit. This label indicates a succinct description of the unit type, i.e. "Temperature" or "Heat Transfer Coefficient".
        Parameters:
        index - an index specifying the unit type
        Returns:
        a String label describing the unit type

      • getUnitsSI

        java.lang.String getUnitsSI​(int index)
        Retrieves the SI unit label of the given unit.
        Parameters:
        index - an index specifying the unit type
        Returns:
        a String indicating the SI label for the units

      • getUnitsBritish

        java.lang.String getUnitsBritish​(int index)
        Retrieves the British unit label of the given unit.
        Parameters:
        index - an index specifying the unit type
        Returns:
        a String indicating the British label for the units

      • getConvFactor

        double getConvFactor​(int index,
                     boolean siToBritish)
        Retrieves the conversion factor for translating values of a specific unit from SI to British or British to SI.
        Parameters:
        index - an index specifying the unit type
        siToBritish - a true indicates the returned conversion factor should translate SI values to British; false indicates the returned value should translate British values to SI.
        Returns:
        the conversion factor (negative values are used for temperatures).

      • convertValue

        double convertValue​(int index,
                    double val,
                    boolean valueIsSI)
        Convert a value from SI to British or British to SI.
        Parameters:
        index - an index specifying the unit type
        val - the value to convert.
        valueIsSI - a true indicates the provided value is an SI value which should be translate to British; a false indicates the value is a British value which should be converted to SI.
        Returns:
        the converted value
